shortdescription:
Level of difficulty: intermediate.


In the NAGARAJA (serpent king) vinyasa krama sequence, we create a safe foundation for deep backbends through the activation and development of the bandhas (muscle locks). Consequently, the practitionerâ€™s spine becomes stronger and more flexible, achieving the suppleness akin to that of the great Serpent King.


To participate, you must purchase ticket or pass online in advance or have a valid pass. To buy a day ticket or season ticket, click on the "Tickets" button.
